name: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza
address: Carrer Des Botafoc, 2, 07850 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Cala Llenya. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Llenya Beach, Cala Mastella Beach and Cala Nova Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 29 km from Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza.

name: Marble Stella Maris Ibiza
address: Ctra. Cap Negret 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Marble Stella Maris is located in a resort Surrounded by six hectares of lush gardens and pine trees, in Cap Negret, 3 kilometres from Ibiza’s San Antoni. It offers swimming pools, a multi-purpose court, a mini golf course and tennis courts. Marble Stella Maris features white low-rise buildings surrounded by gardens. All the rooms include air-conditioned, flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some rooms have a balcony/terrace with sea/garden views. The animation team organises several sport activities and it is provided for all ages. The complex serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, and local alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Marble Stella Maris Ibiza offers WiFi for free throughout the hotel. At the resort rent a car available, ideal for exploring the island. The property is located in a hilly environment and offers a free buggy service to carry guests and their luggage from and to reception. Available from 08:15 to 23:45. Time Schedule could change by daily operations and weather conditions.

name: Hotel Anfora Ibiza
address: Calle Cardona 9, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set just 100 metres from Es Canar Beach, Hotel Anfora Ibiza features terraces, swimming pools and an outdoor spa and fitness area. There is also an on-site restaurant. Air-conditioned rooms are spacious and bright, and include a TV, safe, hairdryer and free WiFi. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet, and both international and local cuisine. Guests will also find a pool bar serving cocktails, and a lounge bar. Hotel Anfora Ibiza has courtesy rooms where you can shower on check-out day and leave luggage. Punta Arabi Hippy Market is 850 metres while Chirincana Bar is just 100 metres from the hotel. Sant Eulalia can be reached in a 10-minute drive, while Ibiza Airport is 45 minutes away by car.

name: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa
address: Calle Narcisos, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa is situated on the seafront next to the Santa Eulalia River. The hotel provides free access to the fitness centre and offers many treatments in the Prestige Spa at an extra charge. Ibiza Airport is 21 km away. All spacious rooms have a balcony and flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete with a separate bath and hydromassage shower. Guests are also provided with a bathrobe and slippers. Indoor and outdoor pool, a herbal steam room and an ice fountain are some of the spa facilities available at an extra charge. Foot baths and a variety of massages are also on offer. There are 4 restaurants offering a choice of Mediterranean, International and Asian cuisine. Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa also has several bars serving snacks, cocktails and ice cream. At the Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa reservations can be made for activities, such as yacht hire. There are golf courses within 6 km of the hotel.

name: azuLine Hotel Bergantin
address: C/Albacete 5-7, 07839 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This establishment is located in Bahía de San Antonio de Ibiza, one of the most important tourist areas of the island, This informal hotel is a 2 minute-walk from the closest beach along the Mediterranean Sea and 5 km from the Aquarium Cap Blanc. It's 19 km from the Ibiza Airport. All air-conditioned rooms at azuLine Hotel Bergantin have a furnished balcony, some with sea views. Each room includes satellite TV, a safe, telephone and a private bathroom including toiletries.The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk and offers a car rental and ticket service. Sant Antoni de Portmany Ferry Terminal with crossings to Denia is just 1.6 mi away and Breakfast is included. All meals are served buffet-style with live cooking stations in the main restaurant, Playa Sa Flama. There is also an on-site pub and a snack bar. The hotel offers a family/activity swimming pool and an Adults Only pool. There is also a kids' pool with a pirate ship, as well as a mini club (ages 4-12) and a playground to keep the little ones happy. Other facilities include tennis, mini golf, volleyball, games room, gym, sauna, hot tub and a daily entertainment programme of activities and professional shows. The beach is just a short walk from the hotel, and there is a bus stop close by that allows you to explore the rest of the island as much as you like.FarePortal

name: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas
address: Carretera Sa Canal de Ses Salines, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas features a garden, a shared lounge and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Ibiza Town. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a tennis court. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, windsurfing, diving can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Las Salinas Beach is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Es Cavallet Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 5 km from Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas.

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa
address: Begonias, 12-18, 07817 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is a luxury apartment complex, located 150 metres from Playa d’en Bossa beach. It has outdoor pools, free WiFi, 24-hour reception and free public parking nearby. The complex offers modern apartments with stylish décor. Each air-conditioned apartment at Migjorn Ibiza has a kitchenette and a spacious living area with satellite TV. Set in attractive gardens, the Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is designed in traditional Ibizan style. It has a business centre, a spa, a gym and a hot tub which can be used for a surcharge. There are 4 swimming pools, including 2 for children, and a pool bar. There is also a children's playground and a gastronomic restaurant. The complex is located in the heart of lively Playa d’en Bossa. Ibiza’s largest water park is nearby. There is also good access to the airport and to Ibiza Town, where you can find Pacha and Hi Nightclubs.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Grupotel Taurus Park
address: Avinguda America, 7, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated 500 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, Grupotel Taurus Park offers tennis courts, indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub and gym. A private balcony can be found in each air-conditioned room. A wide range of regional and international dishes are served in the buffet restaurant. There is also a lounge bar with a terrace. Guests can enjoy evening entertainment, shows and music. Each room at the Taurus Park includes bright, functional décor and satellite TV. A safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Grupotel Taurus Park is situated on Palma Bay, 1.5 km from S’Arenal Harbour. Mallorca Airport is just 4 km away.

name: Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel
address: Carrer de la Vinagrella, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The first golf resort on the island, Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel, continues to be a favored destination for sports enthusiasts and families. Blending Palma’s easy living with sporting heritage and generational appeal, the 93 rooms and suites are designed to suit modern lives. A first-choice location for golfers, Golf Son Vida’s 18th hole is placed within putting distance from the hotel. Bordered by two additional 18-hole pro-standard options, Golf Son Muntaner and Golf Son Quint including a pitch and putt, Sheraton Mallorca is unhindered by boundaries, with fairways and hotel grounds seamlessly merging to create an evergreen environment. Championing a family-friendly dynamic, the hotel’s extensive choice of activities, ranges from playing tennis and volleyball to catering for those willing to explore the island by bike. The brand new Arabella Kids & Tweens Club awaits to welcome our young guests, with fun games and exciting activities. Stay fit while travelling at our new Sheraton Fitness.Marriott

name: Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa
address: 7610 Calle Caravel La Playa De Palma, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in the centre of Playa de Palma and on the beachfront, Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa offers modern accommodation with flat-screen TVs. The complex overlooks the beach and includes an outdoor pool and spa. Fontanellas Playa has a large sports area with a mini-football pitch and guests will find a playground next to the complex. The spa has a sauna, hot tub and a seasonal indoor pool. WiFi is free in all areas incluiding in the rooms. Each of the rooms and apartments has a private bathroom, air conditioning and a furnished balcony. The apartments also have a fully equipped kitchen. The complex is situated just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca, and is surrounded by bars and restaurants. Palma de Mallorca Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Grupotel Orient
address: Carrer de la Duna, 3, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Grupotel Orient is set in a quiet area, just 500 metres from Majorca´s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools with sun loungers, a gym and a sauna. The hotel has good access to Palma city centre, and the airport is just 5km away. There are also many shops and bars in the Palma Beach resort. Grupotel Orient has adapted access with ramps. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with en-suite bathrooms. They all have a balcony, a music channel and satellite TV. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves local and international dishes. There is also a lounge bar with terrace. Live entertainment takes place in the evenings. The hotel has internet corner and mini golf. A courtesy room with shower is also available after check-out. Additional facilities are shared with Grupotel Taurus Park hotel, located 25 metres away. Guests have free access to the tennis courts, gym and a spa. The hotel rents bicycles and tennis rackets.

name: Hotel Bordoy Cosmopolitan
address: Carrer de la Mar d'Aral, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Bordoy Cosmopolitan is situated 500 metres from Palma Beach. Surrounded by palm trees, it offers an outdoor pool a hot tub, free WiFi throughout and a mini-golf course. Balconies can be found in all of the air-conditioned rooms in the Cosmopolitan. Bright and functional, all rooms have a TV and a safe. The gym is well-equipped, and there is special storage for bicycles. Tennis and paddle courts are available for an extra cost. Buffet breakfast and dinner are served in the dining room. It offers a range of Mallorcan and international dishes. The Cosmopolitan is located in a quiet area. A bus stop, offering regular services to Palma de Mallorca can be found less than 5 minutes’ walk away. The airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Blue Sea Costa Verde
address: Avinguda d'Europa, 33, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Set a 10-minute walk from Arenal Beach, BLUESEA Costa Verde is located in Arenal, on the island of Mallorca. This property features a swimming pool, as well as free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms include a balcony, fan and satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries. Late check-out is available for an extra charge. A safe is available for a supplement. The hotel’s restaurant offers breakfast, lunch and buffet dinner. There is a 24-hour front desk, currency exchange services, shared garden and terrace. The property has a children’s playground. BLUESEA Costa Verde is 300 metres from a shopping centre, and there is a bus stop 100 metres away. El Arenal area has lots of shops and nightlife. The airport is 8 km away, and you can drive to Palma in 10 minutes.

name: Hotel y Apartamentos Leman
address: Avinguda Son Rigo 6, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 2.4 km from Can Pastilla Beach, Leman Hotel y Apartamentos provides a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Leman Hotel y Apartamentos, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Palma Yacht Club is 14 km from the accommodation, while Palma Port is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Leman Hotel y Apartamentos.

name: SENTIDO Diamant Hotel
address: Los Romeros, 10, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Set next to Majorca’s picturesque Cala Agulla beach and surrounded by lush gardens, this family hotel provides facilities for a relaxing yet active holiday under the sun. Hotel Diamant has outdoor pools with sundecks, as well as an indoor pool. There is a gym and a sauna. Massage services are available for an extra charge. The air-conditioned rooms at the Diamant feature Mallorcan-style décor. Each one comes with a TV, a private bathroom and a balcony. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the rooms. The hotel’s snack bar serves buffet meals of national and international dishes. There is also a bar where you can enjoy a drink in the sun. The hotel is in a large complex, sharing its facilities with the Aparthotel Diamant.

name: Hotel Condesa
address: C/ Roselles, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Condesa is a 4-star hotel situated right on the beach of Playa de Alcúdia. Large spaces and facilities, comfortable rooms and qualified staff will make your stay a perfect experience! The hotel is located in Alcúdia, the north of Mallorca, ideal place for active vacations thanks to the wide range of sports and leisure activities on offer. Some of the best golf courses are only 8 km from the hotel. Hotel Condesa has 466 rooms with modern, sophisticated design that fits perfectly for couples and families. All rooms are equipped with a complete bathroom, balcony, air conditioning and heating, TV, desk, minibar and safe. You can enjoy the most delicious cuisine with the wide range of dishes available in our various bars and restaurants. Don't miss to visit our Sky Bar (New opening 2021) to enjoy the magnificent views of the Mediterranean, the comfort and chill-out atmosphere. There are three outdoor swimming pools as well as a large solarium with panoramic views to the entire Playa of Alcudia and direct access to the beach. Would you like to have some relax? Our Finnish sauna is ideal for you! The hotel is also equipped with a gym for those who like to keep fit during their holidays.FarePortal

name: Hotel Club Cala Marsal
address: Playa Cala Marsal, s/n, 07670 Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Set just 200 metres from Mallorca's sunny white beaches, this hotel offers a variety of facilities for all the family, including an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and excellent buffet dining. Admire the sea view from your private balcony at the Hotel Club Cala Marsal. Rooms are spacious and air-conditioned, with fully-equipped en suite bathrooms. Take a dip in the Club Cala Marsal's outdoor pool - there is also a pool for children - or head down to the sandy beaches to sunbathe. Explore the fine Mallorcan scenery on a rental bike, work out at the gym, or enjoy a game of tennis, table tennis or snooker back at the hotel. You can sip sangria at the pool bar, or sample Spanish beer at one of the 2 indoor bars. Make the most of a full entertainment programme from Monday to Saturday to keep your kids entertained. There is also a games room and playground.

name: Dreams Calvia Mallorca
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, 26-34, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca, Balears, Spain, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Situated in Magaluf, 100 metres from Magaluf Beach, Dreams Calvia Mallorca offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Dreams Calvia Mallorca include Cala Vinyes Beach, Son Maties Beach and Western Water Park. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Melia Cala d'Or Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Portinatx, 16-18, Cala d'Or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Meliá Cala d'Or offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi throughout the hotel. Located in Cala d'Or, this property is just minutes from the center of Cala d'Or, Cala Gran and Cala Ferrera, You can have a meal at Restaurant Es Llaüt, Sa Pastera, or Salon Wistaria. There is an outdoor pool with a whirlpool and a children's pool surrounded by gardens. This elegant hotel has a central sun terrace and gardens. Rooms feature elegant Mediterranean design and include air condition and free WiFi. In addition, the junior suites have a kitchen and lounge. Es Llaüt is open for breakfast and evening for dinner with local and international cuisine. In Sa Pastera Bar, located poolside, you can enjoy all day drinks and snacks at noon. In addition, during the summer months, it is open at night so they can enjoy a wonderful dinner in a quiet and perfect environment. At the spa, you can enjoy the heated pool, spa bath, sauna, steam bath and bithermal shower and gym. We also have massages and beauty treatments. Room rates include free access to the spa and gym.

name: Aparthotel Tropicana
address: Calle Flor, Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Tropicana Hotel features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Cala Millor. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Tropicana Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Tropicana Hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Cala Millor Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 69 km from Tropicana Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel & Spa Ferrer Janeiro
address: Avinguda Diagonal, 4, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Ferrer Janeiro Hotel & Spa is just metres from the beach in Can Picafort and has its own outdoor swimming pool. There is free WiFi available throughout. The rooms at Hotel Janeiro offer bright décor and a private balcony with great views. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV and heating. Hotel Ferrer Janeiro’s spa centre features a sauna, fitness centre and Turkish baths. Massages are also available on site. A range of Mediterranean and international dishes are served at the hotel’s buffet restaurant with show cooking. Children can enjoy the play area and games room. Hotel Janeiro also offers a regular entertainment programme.

name: Portblue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Alcudia - Pto Pollensa Km 2, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa, 5 km from Alcudia, offers extensive sports facilities, including 3 swimming pools, a tennis court and watersports centre. Please note that the spa is available at an extra cost. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony overlooking the gardens or sea. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The property's spacious, airy rooms are decorated in soft colours. They all include a fridge, a laptop safe and a seating area with sofa. The hotel’s wellness centre has a spa bath (with an extra cost), Turkish bath (with an extra cost) and a gym (free of charge). Beauty treatments (with an extra cost) and massages (with an extra cost) are also available. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa has à la carte and buffet restaurants, as well as 4 bars, including a bar with nightly music. There is also a minimarket and gift shop. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa is located on the seafront in Majorca’s Pollensa Bay next to Can Cap de Bou Beach. Puerto Pollensa is within 5 km, while the S'Albufera Nature Reserve is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
address: Paseo De Illetas, 30, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: Valentin Park Club
address: Calle Luz, 5, Calvià, Mallorca
description: This hotel is 300 metres from the centre of town and 400 metres from Paguera Beach. The Valentin Park Clubhotel is set in more than 10,000m² of gardens. The hotel has a large swimming pool and a terrace with sun beds. There are also children’s pools. A heated indoor pool is available in winter. Other facilities include a sauna and a gym. Valentin Park Clubhotel offers a wide range of entertainment for adults and children. There are professional shows and activities. There is also a playground. All rooms have a balcony. There is satellite TV and full air conditioning. The hotel is in a quiet area of Paguera. This resort offers more hours of sun than any other area in Mallorca. The nearby beaches are ideal for surfing and water skiing.

name: Aparthotel Can Picafort Palace
address: Carretera Arta-Puerto Alcudia km 22.9, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located in Can Picafort, less than 1 km from Can Picafort Beach, Can Picafort Palace provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna, nightclub and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. At Can Picafort Palace every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Can Picafort Palace offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. Platja dels Capellans is 1.4 km from the hotel, while Es Comu Beach is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 62 km from Can Picafort Palace.

name: Grupotel Port d'Alcudia
address: Cisne Blanco, s/n, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Just 300 metres from the beautiful Alcudia Beach and in the centre of the resort, this smart hotel has a fantastic outdoor pool and tennis court. The Grupotel Port d'Alcudia offers spacious apartments and studios. Each one comes with international satellite TV, a kitchenette and a lounge with sofa beds. In the evening, enjoy a delicious drink on the terrace of the Port de Alcudia’s bar. There is also a snack restaurant and poolside bar. The hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Alcudia's beachfront, which has a range of nightlife options. S'Albufera Nature Reserve is 8 minutes' drive away.

name: Bahia de Alcudia Hotel & Spa
address: Avenida de la Playa, 6, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Bahia de Alcudia is just 200 metres from Alcudia Beach, in north-east Majorca. It has an outdoor swimming pool, gardens and terraces. Alcudia’s 15km beach is ideal for watersports. Alcudia Town is only 2km from the hotel. It has a historic Medieval walls. The port and marina are near the hotel. This area has shops and bars. Rooms at the hotel are all en suite and air-conditioned. They have a terrace or balcony, as well as a minibar. Safes are available to rent. The hotel restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast and dinner. Snacks are also available for lunch. The hotel has various bar areas, with live entertainment at night.

name: Grupotel Alcudia Pins
address: Carre Canyes, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Facing the beachfront, Grupotel Alcudia Pins offers 3-star accommodation in Playa de Muro and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers an ATM, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Grupotel Alcudia Pins every room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Grupotel Alcudia Pins, and bike hire and car hire are available. Es Comu Beach is 500 metres from the hotel, while Playa de Muro Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 63 km from Grupotel Alcudia Pins.

name: Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa
address: Ctra. Artà-Alcúdia, 68, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located just a short walk to the Can Picafort beach, surrounded by gardens lays this complex made up of the hotel and apartments with free spa access and free WiFi. The complex offers guests all they need for a fun filled, enjoyable family holiday, including; 2 large swimming pools with children’s pool, mini-club and children’s playground, entertainment programmes, a free Spa & Wellness centre, Conference room for up to 40 people and a sports centre. Alcudia is 12 km away and Palma de Mallorca is 50 km from Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 50 minutes' drive away.

name: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa
address: Bot, 5, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located just 100 metres from the beach, in Majorca’s Port de Pollença. Surrounded by gardens, it offers an outdoor swimming pool, gym and a spa completed with hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, foot bath and heated pool. Rooms at the Cabot Pollensa Park Spa are spacious and bright, with tiled floors and air conditioning. Each room has satellite TV and most have a private balcony with sea views. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the buffet restaurant. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar. Live entertainment and children’s activities are organised by the hotel. Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located on Calle Bot, a popular street with many bars. Pollença Harbour and the old town are within a 15-minute walk.

name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx 19, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: A refined tastemaker located on the southwest coast of Mallorca, The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca is a luxurious family resort offering an exceptional retreat. Arranged across four terracotta-hued buildings, the 125 guestrooms and suites all have large private terraces with an alluring Mediterranean vista. An arbiter of the island’s most distinctive flavors, connoisseurs from near and far converge to dine at our exceptional Michelin-starred Es Fum Restaurant, while the St. Regis Bar with its modern design sets new heights as a lobby art bar on the island. Our new contemporary designed Terra Restaurant brings a fresh air to the hotels classic look with its “Farm to Table” concept, celebrating the island’s rich culinary heritage and local produce. Mar Sea Club will make for a luxurious shore side atmosphere, a go-to destination for those seeking the ultimate in relaxation and indulgence with captivating sea views or by our newly renovated cascade swimming pool.Marriott

name: Hotel & Spa S'Entrador Playa
address: Carrer de l'Agulla, 123, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel & Spa S’Entrador Playa is set near Cala Agulla Beach, in Majorca’s Cala Ratjada. It is surrounded by pine forests, and has impressive views of the coast and hills. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and gardens. There is a play area for children. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre. Rooms at the S’Entrador Playa are bright and comfortable. They all have a balcony and satellite TV. The hotel spa has a sauna, hammam and Turkish bath. There is an indoor pool with hot tub. Massages and other treatments are also available. The hotel has a restaurant and a bar. There is also a 24-hour reception, with a tour desk and currency exchange.

name: Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel
address: Av.Beat Ramon Llull, 53, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set in Cala Millor, 800 metres from Cala Bona Beach, Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a seasonal outdoor pool. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Cala Millor Beach is less than 1 km from the aparthotel, while Natural Park S'Albufera de Mallorca is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 68 km from Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bordoy Don Antonio
address: Carrer de Bonavida 11, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by forests, the Bordoy Don Antonio offers stunning panoramic sea views and modern rooms with a balcony. The hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa area with hot tubs. Spacious rooms come with air conditioning and they also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Hotel Bordoy Don Antonio is 20 km from the capital of Majorca, Palma. There are three 18-hole golf courses within 7 km of the hotel. The hotel provides a free shuttle to the beaches and centre of Peguera. Mediterranean and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. During summer, a snack bar is open on the hotel’s terrace, between the 2 outdoor pools. There are conference facilities for up to 80 people on site, with free internet and audiovisual equipment.

name: Grupotel Amapola
address: C/ Circuit Del Llac, 49, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located next to a lake and just 500 metres from the beach, this smart, family-friendly hotel has a great outdoor pool and tennis court. Kids will make new friends and have fun in the children's playground. Enjoy hearty meals in the buffet restaurant which serves a selection of hot and cold dishes. Have fun with friends and family on the mini-golf course or with a game of pool before the evening entertainment. All rooms feature a smart decor and have a balcony with views of the lake or the park. Each room has a private bathroom. Later in the evening, enjoy a delicious cocktail on the open-air terrace adjacent to the bar. Take the short walk down to the beach where you will find the mild Mediterranean waters.

name: Marsenses Ferrera Blanca Hotel
address: Carrer Sa Partió, 1, 07669 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Offering direct access to Cala Ferrera beach, and close to the most beautiful beaches in Majorca, this fantastic resort is perfect for an enjoyable holiday in the sun. Located in a quiet and peaceful area, this complex is the perfect place to relax. The apartments are fully equipped, and perfect accommodation for families. Take a dip in the hotel’s outdoor swimming pools, complete with sun bathing areas. You can also admire the views from the large terrace, stroll around the garden.

name: Sol Guadalupe
address: Crta. La Porrasa, 4 - Calvia Beach, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Guadalupe is 200 metres from Mallorca’s Magalluf Beach, and offers a 24-hour self-service kitchen for families with babies. It features a large lagoon-style pool with hot tub, indoor pool and 2 children's pools. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a small fridge. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms come with a spacious terrace overlooking the pool, mountains or sea. Sol Guadalupe restaurant offers buffet meals and show cooking in the dining room, which is air-conditioned in summer. There is also an Italian corner and a poolside snack bar. A daytime and evening entertainment programme is provided, including fitness sessions, Tai-chi and yoga. Children have their own playground and mini club. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge. Aquapark is 2 km away and Poniente Golf Club is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Reservations include a free Sol Katmandu Fun Pass with discounts at the Katmandu Theme Park and the Wave House.

name: Prinsotel Alba & Spa
address: Carrer de Conillera, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Set in the resort of Cala d’Or, this recently renovated holiday complex is set just a few steps away from the crystal-clear Mediterranean waters of Cala Gran. Free WiFi is available throughout. The property has been built in a typical Balearic style, providing an authentic Majorcan experience. Relax in the sunshine on a sun lounger before diving into the large outdoor swimming pool. You can also enjoy a cool drink beside the pool from the outdoor bar. Refreshing drinks are also available in the lounge bar. The property is surrounded by Cala d’Or – one of Majorca’s most popular seaside and water sports resorts. From here, you can easily enjoy all that this beautiful island has to offer. Exploring at your own pace is made easy by the reception’s car and bike rental service.

name: Alua Boccaccio
address: Avda. Pedro Mas y Reus, 3, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Alua Boccaccio offers an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony,and has a multi-sports court. Free WiFi is available in public areas. S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 minutes’ drive away from the Boccaccio. Palma de Mallorca Airport can be reached in 45 minutes, by car. Alua Boccaccio is located in Puerto de Alcudia, standing just 150 metres from the sea, it is next to the iconic Lago Esperanza. Alua Boccaccio offers: buffet restaurant, pool bar,cocktail bar, beach bar for snacks and drinks, outdoor swimming pools, multi-sports court, miniclub, free wifi and gym. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions

name: Mar Hotels Playa Mar & Spa
address: Carretera Formentor s/n, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Playa Mar & Spa offers bright studios, 50 metres from the beach in Puerto Pollença, Mallorca. There is a tennis court, outdoor pool, and spa with heated indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Each apartment has a balcony, twin bedroom and living room with a sofa bed and TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The complex has an air-conditioned restaurant, bar and snack bar. There are several lounges and a TV and video room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Playa Mar & Spa has 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or bicycle. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Aparthotel Novo Mar
address: Gavines, 3, 07181 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Aparthotel Novo Mar is 100 metres from Paguera’s Torá Beach, in south-western Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and air-conditioned apartments with a terrace and flat-screen TV. Each bright and modern Novo Mar apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a sofa. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and the well-equipped kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Most apartments have sea views. (upon request and subject to availability) A buffet breakfast is available at the Novo Mar complex. You can also have dinner in the restaurant on prior request, and show cooking is offered. Special diet menus can be requested and there is also a lounge with a flat-screen TV and a bar. Wi-Fi is offered throughout the complex, and is free in public areas. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Santa Ponsa Golf Course is 3 km away and Camp de Mar Golf Course is 3.5 km away.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
address: Avinguda Diagonal 201, 08018 Barcelona
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: Marina Suites
address: Calle Juan Diaz Rodriguez, 10, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set beside Puerto Rico Marina in Gran Canaria, this modern aparthotel offers views over the Atlantic Ocean from its outdoor infinity swimming pool. Rooms come with satellite TV and a private balcony. All of the Marina Suites offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, and are decorated in white. They all come with a kitchen with a hob and microwave, and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a variety of international breakfast at the Atlantic Pool Bar with views of the Atlantic Ocean. The Yacht Club Bar offers board games and a big screen. The hotel offers an adutls area with 2 outdoor hot tubs and baliness beds, as well as a fitness center. Reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Anfi Tauro Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive away from Marina Suites. Amadores Beach is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Gloria Palace San Agustin Thalasso & Hotel
address: Calle Las Margaritas, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Set 600 metres from Las Burras Beach in Gran Canaria, the luxurious Gloria Palace San Agustin offers a rooftop pool with sea views. It features a spa and rooms with a balcony, the hotel has been completely renovated in 2021. Rooms at the Gloria Palace Hotel San Agustin have a simple design and include air conditioning. Most of them enjoy sea views. Free WiFi is available. Gloria Palace has outdoor pools for children and adults, surrounded by gardens and sun terraces with loungers. You can also play padel and tennis, or use the gym, for an extra cost. The rooftop pool also carries a surcharge. The property also offers an on-site bicycle shop, where you can buy equipment and rent a bicycle. Free shuttle buses run to Playa del Inglés and Maspalomas beaches. The Maspalomas Golf Course is 5 km away and special discounts apply to guests at the Gloria Palace Hotel Gran Canaria.

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels
address: Touroperador Fritidsresor 4, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Featuring a garden, Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels is set in Maspalomas and is 3.6 km from Aqualand. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. Maspalomas Lighthouse is 2.4 km away. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. All rooms feature a terrace and views of the garden. Minibar and breakfast in the room services are available for an extra charge. Guests will find a buffet restaurant at the property. Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels offers a children's playground. Palmitos Park is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 28 km from the property.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
address: Mar Caspio, 5, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Abora Interclub Atlantic By Lopesan Hotels
address: Calle Los Jazmines, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This all-inclusive club is located in the higher part of San Agustín, nestled in a 10 acre park boasting fantastic panoramic views of the Atlantic and the vast Maspalomas sand dunes. The complex boasts 168 double rooms plus 240 family rooms with capacity for up to 4 people. Many have sea views, though those with views over the spacious gardens are not less privileged. In the gardens themselves it is always possible to find a spot to place a sun lounger and relax under the palm trees. All roms are equipped with direct telephone, Satellite TV, Safe, Sofa, Bathroom with bath and WC and Balcony or terrace. Traditional Sports enthusiasts area catered well at the club with multi-functional sports facilities including 4 tennis courts and sport grounds. You are also sure to be tempted by the nearby San Agustín beach or one of the 2 onsite outdoor pools, to cool off with a refreshing dip. The complex also boasts a first-class entertainment team that makes sure the day is full of games, group sports, music and evening shows. During the summer months, children have their own mini club and there is a special programme of activities for young teenagersWebBeds

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria, Mogan
address: Avenida Los Marrero 35, 35140 Puerto de Mogan, Gran Canaria
description: This property is 10 minutes far from the beach. Featuring an on-site fitness centre and a spa, Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria is located in Puerto de Mogan. This resort offers 2 swimming pools with a hot tub, as well as 1 pool for children. All spacious, air-conditioned rooms and suites at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan have modern décor and large balconies or terraces. There is a seating area with satellite TV and Apple TV, free WiFi and a bathroom with a bathrobe and slippers. The spa features an indoor pool with water jets, a hot tub, sauna and a Turkish bath. Massages and a range of beauty treatments are also available. The main restaurant Larder offers themed buffet dinners and pre-show dining, while the à-la-carte Filini restaurant serves international fine dining cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink and snacks from the Pool Bar II Taglio, as well as from the Pool Lounge. Other facilities at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria include a rock climbing tower, a tennis and volleyball court, and a running track. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling, diving and cycling. Maspalomas is 18 km from Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria, while Las Palmas de Gran Canaria is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 38 km from Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Mogan, Gran Canaria.

name: Abora Catarina by Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Catarina by Lopesan is located in Playa del Inglés, 250 metres from the Maspalomas Sand Dunes. This hotel features a buffet restaurant, bars, 5 outdoor swimming pools, and fitness centre. All rooms have air conditioning, TV, telephone and sofa bed. The Double Family Pool and Double Deluxe Pool rooms have a terrace and private pool. The Double Superior room with hydromassage and terrace and the Double Garden room have a terrace with garden view. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a shared terrace. Guests can also enjoy the games room and there is a playground for children. Gran Canarias Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Abora Catarina by Lopesan, and the city of Las Palmas is 55 km away.

name: Servatur Waikiki
address: Avenida Gran Canaria, 20, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Servatur Waikiki is located in Playa del Ingles, a 5-minute drive from the beach. This hotel offers an on-site restaurant and bar, terrace, and shared outdoor swimming pool. A free shuttle service to the beach is provided. Each air-conditioned room in this hotel comes with free WiFi, 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV, and wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower. Servatur Waikiki has a 24-hour front desk and offers currency exchange services. There is a fitness centre, solarium, and a basketball court available. An airport shuttle can be arranged for an extra charge. You can find a shopping centre 900 metres from the hotel. Maspalomas dunes and beach are a 5-minute drive from the property, and Gran Canaria Airport is 30 km away.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Castillo
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Canary Island paradise right on the seafrontThe Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort is a hotel especially for families or water sports enthusiasts set in the tranquillity and beauty of Caleta de Fuste. It is located near the airport and the capital of Fuerteventura Puerto del Rosario.This exclusive establishment has modern bungalows and studios next to the beach. They are large and fully equipped to make you feel at home and have been recently refurbished while retaining the traditional Canary Island style. It is a unique resort for sports lovers especially fans of scuba diving and windsurfing but also for those who love golf beach volleyball or any other water sport or outdoor activity. The hotel has several buffet or a la carte restaurants bars and a theatre with a programme to suit audiences of all ages. In addition there is a luxurious USpa for visitors who want to relax and try out the most innovative health and beauty treatments or work out in the fitness studio. There is a kids club offering an endless range of activities and three great swimming pool areas which are also for adults.Barcelo.com

name: Occidental Jandía Mar
address: C/ Playa Del Jable, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: When you stay at Occidental Jandía Mar in Pajara, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute walk of Las Gaviotas beach and Matorral Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Pajara? This hotel has 10204 square feet (948 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Landmar Playa La Arena
address: Lajial 4, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: This hotel is located 50 metres from the volcanic sands of La Arena beach, on Tenerife’s Santiago del Teide Coast. The hotel features an outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. The rooms at Landmar Playa La Arena are spacious and brightly decorated. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. A safe is available for a surcharge. The facilities include a tennis court, mini golf and table tennis. Landmar Playa La Arena is situated in the resort of Puerto de Santiago. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from Mount Teide National Park and Tenerife South Airport.

name: Hotel Lanzarote Village
address: Calle Suiza 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Located opposite Los Pocillos Beach, Hotel Lanzarote Village has its own outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts, and elegant rooms with furnished terraces. Guest can enjoy a relaxing beach holiday at Lanzarote Village, excellently located in the popular Puerto del Carmen resort. Each room feature views of the sea or swimming pool. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. The property has a non-smoking buffet restaurant and a cocktail bar with daily live music. Hotel Lanzarote Village provides billiards, table tennis and darts facilities. There is a game room and a playground for kids along with entertainment activities. Bike rental service is possible at reception. Guest can also enjoy sunbathing by the hotel’s pool, relax in the hot tub or with a massage.

name: Hotel Beatriz Playa & Spa
address: C/ Mato nº 2 - Puerto Del Carmen, Puerto Del Carmen, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Offering rooms with balconies, the Beatriz Playa is set on Puerto de Carmen’s Matagorda Beach, 3 km from Lanzarote Aiport. It features an outdoor pool and spa. Each air-conditioned room at the Playa has simple décor and satellite TV. All come with a private bathroom, small fridge and safety deposit box. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer at the buffet restaurant, which features an attractive terrace. The Davao bar serves snacks by the pool and there is also a piano bar, and a lounge bar. The spa features an indoor hydromassage pool, a sauna and hot tub. Treatments on offer include massage and facials, and there is also a gym. The centre of Puerto de Carmen is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the Beatriz Playa and the nearest golf club is just 6 km away.

name: Landmar Costa Los Gigantes
address: Calle Juan Manuel Capdevielle, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de Santiago, 1.1 km from Playa de Santiago, Landmar Costa los Gigantes offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel provides an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, nightclub and a kids' club. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Landmar Costa los Gigantes every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, mini-golf and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Popular points of interest near Landmar Costa los Gigantes include La Arena Beach, Puerto Santiago Beach and Los Gigantes Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa
address: Calle Gran Bretana, Costa Adeje, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa is located in Adeje’s coast, offering spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera. The luxurious facilities include 12,000 m2 of gardens. Each elegant room has a balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, and safe. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is an a-la-carte and a buffet restaurant on site, as well as a snack bar and several lounges. The nearest beach is 400 metres from Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa. Siam Park is a 3-minute drive from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car. - The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: - access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, - exclusive concierge service, selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, - among other special advantages.

name: H10 Taburiente Playa
address: Calle de Los Cancajos, 36, 38712 Breña Baja, La Palma
description: Hotel Taburiente Playa is 300 metres from Los Carcajos Beach, on La Palma’s east coast. It offers 3 outdoor pools and free parking, as well as a sauna and tennis courts. All air-conditioned rooms at H10 Taburiente Playa have a private balcony and satellite TV. A safe is available for an extra charge. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers show cooking and serves international food. There are also 3 bars, including a poolside snack bar and a salon bar with live music. Room service and packed lunches are available. The coastline around the hotel is popular for scuba diving, and there is a diving centre next door. You can drive to La Palma Airport and Santa Cruz de La Palma, the island’s capital, in 10 minutes.

name: Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites
address: Cataluña 2, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set around a shared swimming pool, 1.5 km from the beach in Adeje, Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites offers apartments with sea views. This aparthotel features an on-site spa. All accommodation has a furnished private terrace, as well as a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave, coffee machine and kettle. There is a bathroom with a shower, bathrobe and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are included. The spa includes a sauna and massage services, available for an extra cost. A fitness centre, bar and games room can also be found at the property. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Siam Park Waterpark is 3 km from Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites and Las Americas Golf Course is 4 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Barceló Tenerife
address: Avd. Grenamora, No. 1, Urb. San Blas, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Tenerife has 331 fully equipped rooms; a buffet restaurant; La Proa gourmet restaurant; four bars and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; handball and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness areaBarcelo.com

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: The perfect place to rest.The Barcelo Castillo Royal Level is located right on the beachfront at Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura where you can enjoy relaxing walks by the sea with the best views of the Atlantic. The tranquillity of the area and the beauty of the beach make it the perfect destination for families and groups of friends wanting to combine rest with fun during their holidays. There is a marina in the area offering a large range of water sports such as Jet Skis Windsurfing and a Diving School. There are 30 bright spacious apartments with fully equipped modern kitchens. Guests have the added benefit of being on the Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort complex and being able to enjoy all the facilities on offer as well as the Thalassotherapy Centre in the Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa. Discover the best local gastronomy in our recently opened restaurant.Barcelo.com

name: Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort
address: Avenida De Las Marismas No. 1, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Ideally located on the eastern coast of Fuerteventura, one of the Canary Islands that is especially renowned for its idyllic beaches and warm temperature all year round. Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort has 266 comfortable rooms and suites designed in elegant Canarian style with private terraces. Our 5-star hotel is home to excellent restaurants offering delicious gastronomic experiences. Guests recharge in the 1,000 m2 wellness center, Hespérides Thalasso spa with a state-of-the-arts thermal circuit and 12 treatment cabins. Yambaland kid´s club offers hours of fun for children with plenty of creative activities. The rest of the leisure facilities include: 4 swimming pools, a fitness center, a tennis court, a mini golf, access to the beach and access to the close by Fuerteventura Golf Club. The selection of meeting rooms with natural sunlight are ideal for hosting any type of social events or meetings.Marriott

name: Occidental Jandía Playa
address: C/ Sancho Panza, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: Established in 2004 and located in Pajara, Occidental Jandia Playa features a rooftop terrace, plus views of Fuerteventura. It provides beach views and complimentary Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. For those travelling with children Occidental Jandia Playa offers supervised child care/activities, a kids pool and a kids club. Occidental Jandia Playa features 498 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Guests of Occidental Jandia Playa can wake up to a satisfying breakfast each morning at Morro Jable Snack Restaurant, as well as dinner at Corralejo Buffet Restaurant in the evening. There are a variety of cafés and restaurants near the hotel, and Costa Calma and Tarajalejo are an easy car trip away. La Lajita Oasis Park can be easily accessed by car.Revato

name: Aparthotel la Piramide
address: Berlina, 7, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Aparthotel la Piramide is a 10-minute drive from Fuerteventura Airport and 3 km from Castillo Beach. It features an outdoor pool, hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym and tennis court. All apartments have a balcony with pool views. There is a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. You can hire the safe, and there is a private bathroom. The kitchenette includes a fridge, hob and coffee maker. The complex has a café, restaurant and poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for snacks. Free parking is available nearby and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Fuerteventura Golf Club is 5 km away.

name: Precise Resort Tenerife
address: El Burgado, 1, 38410 Los Realejos, Tenerife
description: This hotel, located right on the coast, is set in 40, 000 m² of subtropical gardens and has an impressive palm-fringed swimming pool. Enjoy buffet meals and fantastic views over the Atlantic. Stroll through the Precise Resort Tenerife’s fabulous gardens and admire the exotic plants and flowers. Relax with an afternoon siesta under the palms and admire the excellent landscaping while you play tennis or mini golf on the elaborately designed course. The Precise Resort Tenerife’s rooms are elegantly decorated with private balconies from where you may be able to enjoy sea views. Tenerife Sur Airport is 95 km from Precise Resort Tenerife.

name: Gf Victoria
address: Calle Fernando Lopez Arvelo, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located in Costa Adeje just 150 m from Playa del Duque Beach, GF Victoria offers 4 bathing areas and 2 restaurants. Free private parking is available on site. The 242 Suites offer a bedroom with ensuite bathroom, lounge area with separate WC, kettle, coffee-maker and minibar. Smart TV, safety deposit box, air-conditioning and amenities are provided. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Guests will find an adult pool, a family area and naturist pool on the property. GF Victoria also features a glass pool, with transparent walls and bottom which overhangs the façade of the hotel. Children will enjoy the aquatic park, which includes a surf pool. Guests will find sun loungers service. The wide gastronomic offer includes the cuisine of the à la carte restaurant Donaire, and the buffet restaurant Chaboco, where children can learn about healthy food choices. Guests can visit the chill-out Sky Bar Zambra only for adults. Plaza del Duque Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk from the accommodation, while Gran Sur Shopping Centre is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 17 km from GF Victoria.

name: Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity
address: Calle Swing, Salobre Golf Resort, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set within the 18-hole Salobre Golf Course, Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 7 outdoor swimming pools and a spa. This hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Maspalomas. Guest rooms at the resort are equipped with a terrace with mountain views as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. A safe is available at no extra charge. Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 3 restaurants offering a wide range of international and local dishes. Guests can also have a drink in one of the 3 bars available. The wellness centre offers a variety of facial and body treatments. Guests can also join the on-site gym or sports activities such as yoga, basketball or cycling. The property offers a free shuttle to Meloneras Beach. Playa del Ingles is 7 km from Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity, while Playa de las Burras is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 31 km from the property. Please note that both the Sunset Pool and the Spa Centre are adults only. Please note beach transfer is possible every hour from 11:00 to 18:00, subject to availability. Please note that the Gala dinner on the 31st December is included for all rates. Half board dinners are buffet-style. All guests will need to provide a valid ID, including children. Please note that guests must present the credit card used to make the reservation on arrival. Since 17th October 2022, The New and The Old Course merged to feature three different loops by combining the Old Course’s 18 holes and holes 1 to 3 and 13 to 18 of par 36 New Course that will defy you to enjoy the challenges of a course with unparalleled personality.

name: Plus Fariones Suite Hotel
address: C/. Acatife, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: The Plus Fariones Suite Hotel offers direct access to the beach and 3 outdoor pools. It offers rooms with terrace and views of the Atlantic Ocean and is a 10-minute drive from Lanzarote airport. Free sun loungers and towels are provided. The bright suites have a living room with satellite TV. The property offers free safes. Plus Fariones Suite Hotel has a buffet restaurant and a poolside snack bar. There are shops and restaurants nearby. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Puerto del Carmen Marina is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Lanzarote Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Relaxia Lanzaplaya
address: Calle México no 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Set in the Puerto del Carmen resort, this apartment complex is set overlooking the beach. It offers outdoor pools for adults and children, surrounded by sun terraces and loungers. The attractive apartments feature a private balcony or terrace. They come with a well-equipped kitchen and a lounge area with satellite TV. Relaxia Lanzaplaya offers a buffet restaurant, which often hosts themed dinners. Light meals are available from the poolside snack bar. Facilities at Lanzaplaya include ping pong and billiards. The lounge-bar has a TV with international channels. Located in the south of Lanzarote, the resort of Puerto del Carmen has many bars, restaurants and shops. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away.

name: H10 Tindaya
address: Punta Del Roquito, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Set on the beautiful, white sandy beaches of the Costa Calma, this hotel is an ideal spot to enjoy a sunny break in Fuerteventura. This new hotel has been built in a modern, Canarian style and is set around 3 outdoor swimming pools. When not relaxing in the pool or on one of the sun loungers beside it you can head to the hotel’s spa centre for a session of pampering. Here you can enjoy a dip in the hydromassage or indoor pool, experience showers, a sauna, and a range of massage and beauty treatments. Out in the sunshine, you can have fun playing mini-golf whilst children enjoy themselves at the mini club. Then, round off the day with a meal at the buffet restaurant and drink at the bar.

name: Neptuno Costadeje
address: Calle Cataluña Nº3, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located 1.5 kilometres from the beach, this family friendly hotel has much to keep you active and outdoors, and a great pool to relax in the sunshine by. Playa de las Américas is set a short journey from Aparthotel Neptuno Costadeje. Guests at the aparthotel also have discounts at the spa and sports centre, 300 metres away. Enjoy your holiday at your own pace with the property’s great balance of self-catered accommodation complemented by great facilities. You can cook basic meals in the well-equipped kitchen of your apartment or take the night off and dine in the Neptune’s onsite restaurant. The property has badminton and volleyball facilities. Children will have fun and make friends in the play area while grownups will like the traditional-style bar with plenty of seating. Challenge yourself to a workout in the property’s gym before treating yourself to a relaxing massage.

name: Grupotel Flamingo Beach
address: AV. de Las Canarias, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca in the Lanzarote region and Flamingo Beach reachable within 300 metres, Grupotel Flamingo Beach provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. The aparthotel offers 2-star accommodation with a fitness room and sun terrace. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Grupotel Flamingo Beach. La Campana Beach is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Playa Blanca is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote Airport, 30 km from Grupotel Flamingo Beach.

name: Hotel Livvo Corralejo Beach
address: Victor Grau Bassas 1 - la Ol, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: Hotel LIVVO Corralejo Beach is set on the seafront in Fuerteventura’s Corralejo, just 50 metres from the beach. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi throughout. All rooms come with a private bathroom, living room, telephone, satellite TV, WiFi and adjustable air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available for an extra charge. Hotel LIVVO Corralejo Beach offers 24-hours reception, elevator, gym, and a restaurant. The hotel has a covered parking, car and bike rental, a snack bar, and a solarium with sunbeds and sunshades. Also, you can relax with the massages service or play billiard or darts. Corralejo Harbour is 400 metres away and offers direct ferries to Lanzarote. Corralejo Sand Dunes are less than 2 km away.

name: Arena Beach
address: Gomera 5, Corralejo, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: Set just off Corralejo Sand Dunes National Park, Arena Beach features a spa, sauna and gym. It has an outdoor pool, children’s pool and sun terrace. All of the air-conditioned apartments come with either a balcony or terrace overlooking the pool. Interconnected apartments are available. Arena Beach has a buffet restaurant which has a terrace beside the pool. There is also a children’s club, and guests can enjoy live entertainment at night. There is a 24-hour reception where you can rent a car or exchange money. Staff at the tour desk can help you plan excursions around the island. Set in a quiet area of Corralejo, you can reach the nearest beaches in a 10-minute walk from the property.WebBeds

name: Hotel Mirador Papagayo By Livvo
address: C/ Las Palmas, 5, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The 4-star Iberostar Papagayo Resort offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Lanzarote. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's safety deposit boxes, bicycle rental, restaurant, salon, elevator. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer air conditioning, balcony/terrace, mini bar, television, shower to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as spa, massage, steamroom, water sports (non-motorized), fitness center. Convenience and comfort makes Iberostar Papagayo Resort the perfect choice for your stay in Lanzarote.Agoda

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: Ona Las Casitas
address: Calle Fuerteventura 1, Playa Blanca, Yaiza, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Featuring a shared swimming pool and an on-site restaurant, Ona Las Casitas is located in Playa Blanca. It offers air-conditioned apartments with a private terrace. Free WiFi is available. All apartments include 1 bathroom with a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided. Guests can make use of washing machines available at the resort. The living area has a sofa set and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes equipped with an oven, microwave, and a coffee machine. A dining table is also available. The complex also offers a children’s playground and a tennis court. Dorada Beach is 10- minutes’ drive from the property, and Timanfaya Nature Reserve is 21 km away. Lanzarote Airport is 30 km from Ona Las Casitas.

name: Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur
address: C/ Roque Nublo, 1, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This colonial-style hotel on the Costa Adeje features a luxurious spa and beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean. It offers 5 swimming pools, surrounded by sun terraces and gardens. The elegant rooms at the Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur have a balcony and sea views. They include an interactive flat-screen TV, and a separate hydromassage shower and bath. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur includes the Nammu Spa with thermal circuits. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Duque Beach is just 500 metres from the hotel and there is also a fitness centre on-site. Bicycle and car rental can be organised for guests. There are 2 restaurants at the Vincci La Plantación del Sur, one serves creative Canarian cuisine using local produce; the second one, is specialised in charcoal-grilled meat.
